<div class="section" id="common-entities">
<h1>Common Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#common-entities" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h1>
<div class="toctree-wrapper compound">
<ul class="simple">
</ul>
</div>
<div class="section" id="bucket-and-host-name">
<h2>Bucket and Host Name<a class="headerlink" href="#bucket-and-host-name" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>There are two different modes of accessing the buckets. The first (preferred) method
identifies the bucket as the top-level directory in the URI.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>GET /mybucket HTTP/1.1
Host: cname.domain.com</pre>
</div>
<p>The second method identifies the bucket via a virtual bucket host name. For example:</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: mybucket.cname.domain.com</pre>
</div>
<div class="admonition tip">
<p class="first admonition-title">Tip</p>
<p class="last">We prefer the first method, because the second method requires expensive domain certification and DNS wild cards.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="common-request-headers">
<h2>Common Request Headers<a class="headerlink" href="#common-request-headers" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="32%">
<col width="68%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Request Header</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CONTENT_LENGTH</span></tt></td>
<td>Length of the request body.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DATE</span></tt></td>
<td>Request time and date (in UTC).</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">HOST</span></tt></td>
<td>The name of the host server.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">AUTHORIZATION</span></tt></td>
<td>Authorization token.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
